\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 57180}

\subsection*{My Life and Near Death}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Tbone}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &  repeated & IM & Pharms - Nalbuphine & \\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 &  repeated & IV & Pharms - Oxycodone & \\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 &  repeated & IM & Pharms - Oxycodone & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 160.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I started out doing IM shots of Nubain.  It was cool, but my tolerance rose fast.  Then I was introduced to oxy. My first trials with it were IM shots as well.  Started off with just 20mgs at first.  Then like everything, that went up.  Then I started banging it (IV) that's when shit got bad.  



I was doing anywhere between 30-60 twenties a week. The withdrawals were horrible.  And the habit cost me everything. Cold sweats, bodY aches, dry heaving\ldots all symptoms of withdrawal.  Not to mention the crazy shit I think about doing to get it.

\end{document}
